This Windows was made by me this afternoon and contains both architectures (x64 and x86) on the same ISO. 
Ã‚Â 
Although Microsoft has shown Windows 10 yesterday, today, anyone who wants can already download a previous version of the operating system. The company expects to collect feedback from users to improve the software to make the final version. 

The two Portuguese versions are available in only one ISO. The links are available here; just download the corresponding transfer the ISO file to a DVD or flash drive and boot the computer connected with the media to do the installation. 

Remember that Windows Technical Preview is available and mistakes that not only can, but should appear. Expect the stable version is always safe and it will possibly be different this that was released now.
